英文法規名稱: Standards for Funeral Director Certificate Fees
中文法規名稱: 禮儀師證書費收費標準
沿革內容:
1.3 articles formulated and promulgated in Order Tai-Nei-Min-Zi No. 1020299112 on September 12, 2013
2.Article 2 amended and promulgated in Order Tai-Nei-Min-Zi No. 1040405422 on February 25, 2015
3.Article 2 amended and promulgated in Order Tai-Nei-Min-Zi No. 1061102829 on July 10, 2017

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards for Funeral director Certificate Fees (hereinafter referred to as the Standards) are formulated in accordance with Article 7 and Paragraph 1, Article 10 of the  Charges and Fees Act.

The funeral director certificate fees are charged as follows:
1. According to Articles 3 and 8 of the Regulations for Administration on Funeral Director, the funeral director certificate fee is NT$1,000 per issuance or renewal.
2. According to Article 10 of the Regulations for Administration on Funeral Director, the funeral director certificate fee is NT$600 per re-issuance.
The Standards shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
